metadata.title: CVE-2022-31782 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
ftbench.c in FreeType Demo Programs through 2.12.1 has a heap-based buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31782` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.12.1+dfsg-3
libfreetype6 - 2.12.1+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.12.1+dfsg-3').
